responses.gpt4: Thank you for clarifying. Those are all great options - mashed potatoes, white bread, white rice, and yogurt. They should all be easy for your body to process in preparation for the procedure. If you have any other questions about your diet, medication or about the procedure itself, feel free to ask at any time.
responses.our_model: Ah, yogurt is a great choice! It's a good source of protein and can be a comforting food. Just remember to choose a low-fiber variety. This is one of those rare times when doctors want their patients to be eating low fiber comfort foods. Do you have any other questions about the diet?
